00075         struct _BSAPI ScriptRecord
00076         {
00078                 bstype* members;
00079                 // Todo: in a poor example of RAII, this is allocated by ObjectDefinition::createScriptRecord,
00080                 // and deallocated in ~ScriptRecord, which is called by <Object>::onRelease
00081 
00083                 int numMembers;
00084 
00086                 int curState;
00087 
00089                 ScriptState scriptState;                
00090 
00091         public:
00092 
00095                 explicit ScriptRecord(int numLocals);
00096                 
00099                 ~ScriptRecord();
00100         };
